sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"overviw"}}>{`Overviw`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"modification-tracking"}}>{`Modification tracking`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A file in pando can have three different and disjoint statuses: `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`tracked`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`untracked`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`ignored`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`A `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`tracked file`}</MDXTag>{` is a file whose modifications pando will take into account and automatically consider for snapshots.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`An `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`untracked file`}</MDXTag>{` is a file whose modifications pando will `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`not`}</MDXTag>{` take into account and automatically consider for snapshots.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`An `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="li">{`ignored`}</MDXTag>{` file is a file that is completely ignored by pando.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`An example output of the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`gl status`}</MDXTag>{` command `}{`(`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`foo.py`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`bar.py`}</MDXTag>{` are tracked files with modifications, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`.gitignore`}</MDXTag>{` is an unmodified tracked file, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`baz.py`}</MDXTag>{` is an untracked file and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`foo.pyc`}</MDXTag>{` is an ignored file`}{`)`}{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-text","metastring":""}}>{`\$ ls
bar.ts  baz.ts  foo.ts  .gitignore
\$ pando status
branch: master

tracked files with modifications:
  ➜ these will be automatically considered for commit
  ➜ use gl untrack <f> if you don't want to track changes to file f
  ➜ if file f was committed before, use gl checkout <f> to discard local changes

    foo.py
    bar.py

Untracked files:
  ➜ these won't be considered for commit)
  ➜ use gl track <f> if you want to track changes to file f
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
